verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees. <S%H4609><s%> Blessed <S%H835><s%> is every <S%H3605><s%> one that fears <S%H3373><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> that walks <S%H1980><s%> in his ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the labor <S%H3018><s%> of your hands: <S%H3709><s%> happy <S%H835><s%> shall you be, and it shall be well <S%H2896><s%> with you.

Your wife <S%H802><s%> shall be as a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> by the sides <S%H3411><s%> of your house: <S%H1004><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> like olive <S%H2132><s%> plants <S%H8363><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about your table. <S%H7979><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> that thus <S%H3651><s%> shall the man <S%H1397><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%> that fears <S%H3373><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you out of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> and you shall see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2898><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H2416><s%>
Yes, you shall see <S%H7200><s%> your children's <S%H1121><s%> children, <S%H1121><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> on Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
